item.title: Regular Expressions!
item.description: Regular expressions, or regex, extract information from text by searching for matches of a specific pattern. They can be used in almost every programming language, including Python and R. Arguably the most powerful tool in regex is findall(), which I will be talking about today. The findall() function finds ALL of the matches and returns them as a list of strings, where each string represents one match. Here are some common symbols used in regex, for your own knowledge:
